analysis.description:
EtherKnightGame.process_sub_Taxes (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#657-696) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_dev)(owner,address(0)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#679-680)
	- HDXcontract.appreciateTokenPrice.value(_appreciation)() (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#693)

Reentrancy in EtherKnightGame.CoreBuyShare (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#761-854):
	External calls:
	- _nb_token = HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_tempo)(_player_address,_referrer_address) (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#789-793)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#805-807)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#807-809)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#812-813)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#822-826)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#797-798)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#814)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#827-835)

Reentrancy in EtherKnightGame.CoreBuyShare (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#761-854):
	External calls:
	- _nb_token = HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_tempo)(_player_address,_referrer_address) (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#789-793)
	- process_sub_Taxes(_GameRoundData,200000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#837-839)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#843)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#846-847)

EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#1039-1181) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.turnround == 1

EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#1039-1181) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.turnround == 1
EtherKnightGame.actionTreasure (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#992-1009) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.event_target == perso
gamevar in EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#1055-1057) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtherKnightGame.process_sub_Taxes (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#657-696) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_dev)(owner,address(0)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#679-680)
Parameter '_referrer_address' of HDX20Interface.buyTokenFromGame (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#52-54) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_player_address' of HDX20Interface.payWithToken (/unique_chucks/9/0x09927c55998a0ea12b8f24932356fce3a46dde12.sol#55-56) is not in mixedCase
